-----Lyoshik-----
---Lyoshik Task 1---
What do you want?
Dedushka Yegor sends me, he says you're the man to ask for drugs.
Nothing.
What the fuck? \n \nFirst, Yegor is an old friend, you I don't know! \n \nSecond, I'm not your fucking drug dealer, you don't come to me to harass me about some fucking drugs, and what I'm doing is my business and my business alone! \n \nSo I ask you one last time, how do you know Yegor and what the fuck do you want?
I'm sorry Lyoshik, we got off on the wrong foot. I'm a friend of Yegor, I met him in the Rookie Village and helped him out. He wanted some weed and told me that you're the guy to ask.
What the fuck is your problem asshole?
I see. Old Yegor is a bit too trusting, I'd prefer if he kept his mouth shut about me. But as you're already here, there is nothing to be done about it. And no, I'm not exactly in the drug business, sometimes if I got my hands on some I shared it with Yegor but that's all.
Alright. Sorry to bother you about it.
Don't sweat it. \n \nBut on the other hand you seem to be of the capable kind... \n \nAre you interested in making some money?
Sure, I can always use some extra cabbage.
Nah Lyoshik, not today.
Good. Word on the street is that the gopniks got a shipment of drugs. They are waiting near the Farmstead for their client. Do you care to lighten them of this burden?
I thought you weren't in the drug business?
Don't get cocky. I said I'm not in the dealing business, but that doesn't mean that I don't know how to make money. \n \nSo you in or not?
Yeah I'll do it.
Nah Lyoshik, I'm not interested in stick-up jobs.
Good. Pack some heavier heat, these guys ain't chumps. Come back with the stuff, and I'll make it worth your while.
About the job you proposed, I'll do it. What shall I do?
Who gave this information to you?
Alright let's get this straight from the very beginning. My contacts are my contacts, it doesn't concern you, and you'd do well to keep your nose out of my business. I tell you what you need to do, that's all you need to know. \n \nSo you in or not?
I got the package.
Nice here is your green.
What the fuck? Is this a fucking joke?
Hahaha, relax I'm joking, here is your reward. \n \nHow was it? Did you enjoy your trip?
You were not lying, they put on a fight.
The Gods of the Zone were on my side.
I live - they don't. I'm not complaining.
I have to confess, I wasn't sure if you'd come back alive ... or if you'd run away with my package. Good, you seem of the trustworthy type, we will do some good business together.\n \nTalking of business, I got a job for you. Lick your wounds, spend your money or burry it if that's your jam. When you're ready, come back to me and we will discuss the problem.
Ah, you're one of those... I don't judge.
...
Be it as it may, I have to confess, I wasn't sure if you'd come back alive ... or if you'd run away with my package. Good, you seem of the trustworthy type, we will make some good business together.\n \nTalking of business, I got a job for you. Lick your wounds, spend your money or burry it if that's your jam. When you're ready, come back to me and we will discuss the problem.
---Lyoshik Task 2---
I'm ready for your task.
Good to see yo're hungry for cash. \n \nI was expecting a courrier in my services, but he didn't show up. I don't know what happened to him; if he died, fell in a hole, fell in love or betrayed me. The important matter is that he carried sensible information. \n \nI want you to find him or his remains and recover the PDA. If he's still alive, find out what happened. If he betrayed me, give him the traitor's fate.
I understand. Where should I look for him?
He was supposed to come from the Dead City. But if I were you, I'd start with the Barkeeper, he has a keen eye, and if my courrier passed thourgh there the Barkeeper certainly knows.
Alright, I'll hit the road then.
I trust your capabilities, but be vigiliant. He is a though guy, so whatever got him isn't some random dog. And if he's still alive, well...
I'll be carefull.
Good luck.
Did someone coming from the Dead City made it here?
From the Dead City? Not that I know of...
Any incidents in the vicinity?
Monolith was very active in the Red Forest these past couple of days, no Stalker would have dared traveling from there.
Any incidents in the vicinity?
Some Stalkers report that the mutants in the Wild Territories made some victims. Maybe your guy is among them?
I found your courrier... or rather his remains.
Save me the suspense, what happened?
He found his demise in the Wild Territories near the Crispy Train Anomaly. I believe some Snorks and Bloodsuckers got him.
Fuck, what a shitty end. Did you at least find the PDA he was carrying?
I did but I doubt it will be useful to you, the thing broke in two. Smashed by a Snork it seems.
Fucking mutants... \n \nThis shit is broken, but the information inside might still be retrievable...
Your guy was a Merc, did you know that? Ran around in a Stalker outfit.
And?
Thought you weren't aware... You got some far reaching connections Lyoshik...
What the fuck Lyoshik, you're working with Mercs? Are you working with Monolith too?
I made it my business to have connections. Beside, don't always judge by the colour of their patch, some of the greatest assholes here are to be found among the Loners. But even I, the Great Pragmatist, don't deal with Monolith, so rest assured.
*Pulls gun* \n \nWasn't I clear last time? My business is my business, and it doesn't concern you! So fuck off!
Yeah true enough. Still, I hate Mercs.
Chill Loyshik, I was only surprised. Can't stand the bunch, that's all.
Fuck you Lyoshik, people like you are the cancer in the Zone.
Good, so we have an understanding *holsters gun* \n \nEnough of this, I'm sure that you want some compensation for having to touch a Merc. Come back when you cooled off.
And I don't need you to like them. Quite on the contrary, it will make things easier in the future *giggles* \n \nBut enough of this, I'm sure that you want some compensation. Here, enjoy. Come back if you want some more.
---Lyoshik Task 5 The Heist: Recruit---
Yo Lyoshik, tell me about your big plan.
I'm planning this gig for a very long time, one of the greatest heists of the history of the Zone! Even more legendary than the Great Underground Robbery by Monomakh.
What or whom do we hit?
The Great Underground Robbery? Monomakh? What are you talking about?
You never heard the story? Although, it was quite a long time ago...
It's too early to fill you in in all the details, as we have to prepare first. This matter requires the greatest secrecy, if someone else gets wind of it, we're fucked. I'll tell you the details when the time comes, be patient cossack and you will be an ataman.
Damn Lyoshik, you're getting on my nerves with all this secrecy. What is the first step in your preparations?
The first step will be to recruit some more people. Don't look at me that way, these are people I know and trust, some heavy calibers not your local moron. I need you to find and convince Danila, Boris and Sergey. We will meet here and we'll discuss the second stage.
Where can I find them?
That's the catch, they're quite elusive characters. I tried to keep my ear to the ground, buy the information is still flimsy. \n \n
Tell me about Danila.
Tell me about Boris.
Tell me about Sergey.
Danila is quite the killer. Veteran from Chechnya, did some high profile hits in St Petersbourg, Moscow and from what I heard America too. \n \nLast I heard he slipped through the Red Forest a couple of weeks ago. Look for him somewhere in the north, Jupiter or maybe Zaton.
Boris the Blade, or also known as Bulletdodger Boris. The guy is apparently immortal, although I wouldn't advise to find out. Apparently ex-KGB. Worked for some time in London, but came here a couple of years ago. Was active in the weapon smuggling business. \n \nI don't know where he is at the moment, but ask around weapon traders, they might have heard of their colleague.
Sergey is quite the allrounder. Smuggling, muscle, everything. Did some prison in the US too. \n \nI don't know much about his whereabouts, you'll have to ask around.
I'll look for them.
Do that, I'll prepare the next stage in the meantime.
What are you looking at?
Lyoshik sends me. He plans something big and he wants you in.
Nothing.
Ah Lyoshik is that so? As much as I'd like to participate, I'm caught up in something at the moment.
What is the problem?
I suppose you could be of help, especially as Lyoshik deems you capable enough of leading the crew. \n \nI was supposed to deliver a custom SVD to Clear Sky for Nimble. On the way to the Swamps an emission surprised me and I had to seek cover here. There was this guy, probably noticed the value of the rifle I was carrying. Grabbed the rifle during the night and made off to the Underground. I don't have the hardware to follow him in there, so I tried to ambush him on the way out... but he never showed up. Something got him down there. If you could go down and find the rifle for me, I'd be much obliged and free to run with Lyoshik and you.
Sure I'll find your rifle.
I need to gear up first.
Thanks Stalker.
I'll be waiting.
I found your rifle.
Thanks Stalker. How did you find him?
Dead. Was rotting where you suspected him to be. The rifle didn't do him any good.
Serves that fucker right... Here for the trouble, and some extra. \n \n Now, I'll be on my way soon, making this delivery. Where can I find Lyoshik and you later?
In the Army Warehouse, in one of the barracks.
Alright, I'll be there.
What are you looking at?
Lyoshik sends me. He plans something big and he wants you in.
Nothing.
Ah Lyoshik is that so? Tell him no.
